channel.title: Minimap is glitched [TURNS SQUARE] [317]
channel.description: When I'm not near an NPC or a Player the Mini Map glitches and turns square. Can you point me in the right direction to fixing it?

item.title: Minimap is glitched [TURNS SQUARE] [317]
item.dc:creator: @TheLetterQArousesMe TheLetterQArousesMe
item.description:
@TheLetterQArousesMe wrote:

[quote=“zyle1992, post:5, topic:430975”][quote author=TheLetterQArousesMe link=topic=533652.msg3901627#msg3901627 date=1327816872]

when you click it?

Basically, if a player is not near an NPC or a Player (or an icon on the minimap, such as when a Yew tree, or a quest start is near), the client’s minimap comes out of the circular frame and turns square. This is a glitch in most 317 clients, I just want to learn where I should fix it at.
[/quote]
Hmm :\ it’s been on every client I’ve used. I have no idea where the minimap area is though.

Actually, I’ve never had that problem, with any 317/377 unmodified client I’ve used. This leads me to believe that is due to people modifying the client without knowing exactly what they’re doing that causes this problem.[/quote]

Read full topic

Basically, if a player is not near an NPC or a Player (or an icon on the minimap, such as when a Yew tree, or a quest start is near), the client’s minimap comes out of the circular frame and turns square. This is a glitch in most 317 clients, I just want to learn where I should fix it at.[/quote]

Actually, I’ve never had that problem, with any 317/377 unmodified client I’ve used. This leads me to believe that is due to people modifying the client without knowing exactly what they’re doing that causes this problem.

Read full topic
